place_description: Coffeehouse chain serving signature drinks, mochas & lattes, plus coffee & breakfast.

reviews_data.review_text: Great coffee and great atmosphere. We love going on the weekends. I love the hot mochas and the campfire mochas are good too.
I prefer Caribou...this location...to Starbucks. I find the employees a bit happier, more engaged and the atmosphere is cozier.
Always great service and a great cup of coffee. Quick getting mobile orders ready!

I cannot say enough of how incredible the atmosphere, the culture  and the people are all about Red Carpet Treatment  It's just amazing here and to me it is the best coffee ever!

Please Open up more I'm thinking Huntersville would be a Grrrreat Location!
Delicious mocha!
Always friendly service and excellent tasting drinks!
Everyone is very friendly. Great smoothies, snacks, and frozen hot chocolate:)
Always fast service when I use the mobile app to order. Friendly and smiling faces most times when I pick up my order.
How completely dissapointing. The prices have skyrocketed, and then the cup isn't filled all the way. You definitely don't get what you pay for
The app is quick and easy to use! This location has lots of nice outdoor seating (covered and uncovered) as well, which is nice.
Always friendly staff and very quick in getting your drinks prepared!

I've been to all of the Charlotte Caribou locations and this one takes the cake. It's the only one I'll go to even though others are closer, I don't mind going a bit further. This location has the most amazing staff! I hope these baristas are being taken care of by the company because they do their job like no other! The customer service is great and always swift. As for the coffee, amazing every time. This location makes it delicious every single time and that's what other locations lack, the consistency of good coffee. I recommend Caribou to everyone and I always say visit this specific location. I really like the inside of this location and the seating right outside & beside the store.

Coffee was delicious!!! And will be back for this!!!!

Coffee cake - moist, decent flavor but the topping wasn't great.

Raspberry scone - my friend got stomach ache
Love this location   It's very local feeling.  Baristas are wonderful and remember your name.  Caribou coffee is always great.  So much better than Starbucks or Duncan
Custom drinks and pastries!
So glad I made the switch from Starbucks to caribu.  Wish they had more locations.   So friendly, fast, and never messed up an order yet.  The app is great as well!
Excellent place
I was there to see the doctor no food
Sweet staff.  We will come here any day over the competitor because of the crew.  They are kind and seem to really like serving others.  Great job!
Always friendly & welcoming. Today they took time to explain the weekly special offers in my app.
This is the place to get coffee with the BEST atmosphere in town. Very laid back.
Coffee was good, food was not.

Love this Caribou!  Staff is fantastic, very friendly and always have the perfect recommendation.  And that asiago bagel, omg.  Caribou's coffee itself is the best, was so happy to find one in the area.
The baristas were so friendly and accommodating at such early hours in the morning, and it was the best white mocha ever had! I MISED THIS PLACE
Cool spot ..waaayyyy better than Starbucks
Staff is always friendly and they have good decaf espresso which is a must for me.
Hands down, my favorite coffee!
Our favorite weekend morning coffee spot.  Love the mint condition!
Delicious drinks and friendly employees! We drive past a lot of other coffee shops to go to Caribou!
Amy rocks!!!! Raise her pay.....
This is my favorite location of caribou. The team is friendly and acknowledge me when I walk in. And they make the best hot chocolate ever!
Ordered and picked up a superb product by superb staff
I order from the app and my coffee is always hot and ready when I get there!
Love my Caribou! The one place I get great dark chocolate, hot chocolate! Staff is so welcoming and kind. They feel like wonderful friends.
Very friendly staff, JD greeted me when I came inside, made sure I got my caribou perks and made me a delicious caramel and maple iced latte! Nice seating inside with a cute fireplace.
Very cozy options for your coffee needs with a comfortable setting and inviting staff.
New Years Day Morning 2024.Worst Customer Service ever!  No sleeves for the cups, no coffee stoppers, no bags for the merchandise. The cashier was extremely Rude. Makes me wish I was at Starbucks!
Keep up the good work and have a nice day while you're at it.  Thank you very much.
I enjoyed the warm cinnamon coffee cake, staff was friendly and helpful.
Delicioso cafe
5stars all day everyday. The coffee is always amazing and there's very few Caribous in Charlotte. We drive 30 min there and back home everyday just for it. There's nothing like it.  #ICaribouCoffee
Coffee shop on a Sunday morning was great because of the comfy leather chair I was sitting in reading. Relaxing and friendly customer service....just wish they had whole milk.
I love Caribou coffee. Their coffee is worlds beyond better than Storblocks, just wish they had more locations around
Great place and staff
Very nice coffee shop with attractive interior and top quality coffee
Love caribou!
Great atmosphere and high quality. We have always loved Caribou Coffee from the store but this just took it to the next level. I wish there stores were more wide spread!
Nice good looking coffee shop in a decent location. My personal favorite is campfire nitro mocha!
The iced oat milk latte with honey is phenomenal! Hazel helped me pick the perfect drink. Also, bring your reusable cups... they'll put your drink in it. :)

I love this place! Amazing coffee and nice atmosphere. All the employees are very friendly and do an amazing job except for one. I don't know her name but it's the Asian girl who ALWAYS had an attitude. I mean every single time I come in. Regardless if she is the one taking my order or making the coffee it's always wrong she either makes it wrong at the bar or rings it up wrong on purpose and I'm sick of it. Makes the experience unpleasant. I wish she would be fired already but other than that I love this place. If they replaced her with any other employee like the rest of them this place would be 10/10.
Great coffee shop with excellent service and friendly staff.

Caribou is rare in Charlotte. This is one of the few remaining and it's a pretty awesome hangout. I feel their drip coffee is better than the Green Siren people. Lots of seating inside and a couple of tables outside. Free wifi.

Decent sized parking lot though getting back on to Fairview/Tyvola going westbound is a challenge.
It's as if people of color can't drink coffee. The staff was great...some of the customers couldn't stop staring
Wasn't crazy about the cake pop. Will have to go again to try the coffee

Service was a little slow but it was a busy Saturday morning. The food is obviously pre-packaged and just maybe heated in the microwave. Got a regular house coffee and it was not tasty at all. Distinctive burnt taste..threw about a third of it away.
Great location, great employees.
Great coffee and service - restrooms could be cleaner
Here we are again and again. Holiday season cup and nice warming welcome atmosphere...berry white mocha on the go !
Nice clerks
If it ain't the bou it ain't for you
Pretty cool coffee shop. Great for a quick meeting, writing or study spot. Calm and cozy enviornment.
Placed 2 different to-go orders and they were spot-on. If we lived here we'd be here everyday.
Delicious
Great place to get
Ordered the honey oatmeal iced crafted press and it was so smooth and easy to drink.. highly recommend trying if coffee is too hard for your stomach!

Very good coffee, the service is super quick too! Quicker than any other coffee shop. All around A+

Way better than starbs and way quicker than niche coffee shops
Service was quick and very friendly!
Awesome frozen dark hot chocolate
One of my absolute favorite cups of coffee. Great bakery items as well.
Greated promptly on entering.  Ordered coffee and was ready right away.  The coffee  was good and  hot.  The shop seats were comfortable.
This was my 1st visit and because of the Awesome staff and a Manager who didn't mind helping is the reason I will be back
Excellent coffee
Fast service and friendly.
Absolutely the best coffee shop in town
This place is incredible. It could crush starbucks every day of the year.

Love breakfast sandwiches in the afternoon, but when I order a medium coffee and the batista says this is all I have do you want decaf? And shows you barely a small in your medium cup but then goes on to charge you for a medium when you don't want decaf is a little frustrating.  I didn't complain, and I won't mention any names because the world is short staffed and I wasn't trying to ruin anyone's day. I Still left a 20% tip for my coffee and sandwich but the owners should address this with the staff and tell them in the future if a coffee shop runs out of coffee to only charge how much coffee is in the cup not how big the cup is...
The best cup of coffee in Charlotte and the most helpful staff that keep the line moving.
Wife loves it. Fast friendly service.
Great place
Good coffee, great service.
The ladies there were very friendly and the bathrooms have a changing table for babies.
Nice place to meet and enjoy a nice cup of coffee or work.
These people really lost thier mind when the mask mandate was going on.  They have better coffee than Starbucks but still have bad morals.
Great atmosphere and amazing drinks! The staff is very nice and helpful as well will be back!
Great customer service
I randomly stopped by this hidden gem. The service was exceptional and the food is delicious. I will be a return customer for sure.
Great spot, awesome coffee and service. Thank you.
The 2 guys their were awesome
Great nitro!
Fast and safe... delicious!
The cold press is pretty good. Kind of over priced
Nice small coffee shop. Have eliminated indoor seating, but it's a good grab and go.
I miss the Caribou on East Blvd. Or Caribeast as we used to call it. I'll drive down to this location every so often because Caribou has the best lattes.

Caribou is so fresh and the coffee isn't watered down or full of so much syrup you can taste it at the bottom of the cup. I drive a fair distance to get it as a treat on the weekend.  I wish there was a location closer to my home!
Crazy busy, but fast & great service.
Caribou coffee is, by far, one of the best coffee cafes around. They have great selection, and the staff is always friendly.

I've gotten coffee and hot chocolate from this store ever since I was 4 years old. Never once have I ever had a bad experience. The coffee is fantastic, the smoothies are perfectly blended, and the employees are the friendliest people I've ever met in a coffee shop. Whether the order is online, curbside, or in store, the experience is always amazing. The only bad thing i could think of is theres no feature here to leave 6 stars. They deserve it.
I always love this shop. Great team, perfect coffee
Always great service and delicious coffee!!
Very friendly and knowledgeable staff, The only problem is they're only taking credit cards now they're not taking cash at this time
Coffee is excellent and the staff was friendly and quick.
Service was quick and very friendly! But their coffee over exceeded my expectations!! Its truly amazing. Worth every penny.
Very great environment , nice workers , and they even have perfect morning drink for kids with (kids temperature ) lol!!!!

Very kind staff that quickly got all of our orders ready, it was a complicated order (along with busy time) and led to one missed drink but they were extremely quick to remedy the situation. All this is a plus on top of quality enough bou-ritos and coffee.

I started going to Caribou Coffee when I was either 13 or 14 years old. I remember one drink in particular called The Mint Condition. I'm now 35 years old and y'all still serve the mint condition which is always been my favorite. 20 years later and the drink is just as good as I remember it as a teenager. I'm thankful that y'all are still around.
Nice friendly atmosphere, dog and kid friendly
Delicious
Delicious Chai Tea Latte and exquisite very delightful banana bread

We enjoy taking a few minutes out of our day to relax at Caribou Coffee.   Atmosphere is so comfortable and relaxing as compared to other coffee houses.  Coffee is excellent.  A variety of food items.  Gift items available as well.
I'd recommend.
Great staff and atmosphere.
Neat coffee shop. Quite busy durning rush hour times.
Good but very hi prize and why down south u ask for regular coffee n they serve u blk coffee north n ny regular is w cream n sugar
Good coffee
Good coffee and nice atmosphere. Kinda small, so get there early if you want to sit and chat with friends
Love the White Chocolate Mocha! Staff are very friendly and treat you like an old friend. I go wherever I'm in the area.
Best Mocha I've ever had
Always a great cup of coffee and friendly staff! The coffee shop is super clean and cozy too!
The best coffee I have ever had. Amazing staff and fast serving. Such a cozy environment as well ! Caribou > Starbucks
The Carmel highrise is the best.
Great service, great hospitality,  and great customer service
Nice..

Always friendly, drinks are usually good. The one time i wasn't satisfied, they quickly rectified the problem, so customer service is great. Love the sparkling lemonade green tea w/extra shot of green tea.
Better then Starbucks!!
Awesome
Expensive,slow
Best coffee shop, best staff, in the city.  No question.
Very nice environment. The chocolate they put in hot chocolate and mochas is very good
The place was amazing! They had amazing service
Delicious coffee and great service!
Ok
Nice and cozy environment, good coffee, very relaxing environment with a fireplace
Great service.  I am addicted to the Milk Chocolate Mint Condition.

It felt nice to swing by a Caribou Coffee, I haven't been to one in years
Nice place!
Love that shop... & JD is awesomeness top notched!
Great tasting coffee! Miss their multiple locations.

I really wish there were more Caribou Coffee houses around us, it is so much better than Starbucks, no burnt coffee taste. It's so sad that so many people have bought into the giant corporation of the competition, without regard for the superior quality of Caribou.  Maybe people will wake up someday.
This place is chill, great coffee...always better than Starbucks
The place was amazing! They had amazing service and were very patient whenever I was ordering my coffee, they make everything top quality and it's amazing there! Would recommend!
Good but high priced

This place is a hidden jewel. Atmosphere seems great. Service was quick and good. Good for morning drinks, but in my opinion not so good for breakfast. The sandwiches that they have available are pre packaged. They're not fresh. I can stop by the gas station and get a pre packaged sandwich. They did have pastries which the cashier did where fresh within 24 hours. Had a apple fritter. It was very dry and tasted more like a cinnamon roll with no glazed that set for a couple of days in display. Drinks, good. Atmosphere, good. Food, not so good.
Great Staff
Better than Starbucks
Great place for hanging out with friends and family. Nice feeling. Great drinks.
My kids love the coffee here
The service was very fast and efficient. The cashier was very friendly. Thank you for my free birthday drink, it was awesome!
Love those peeps

I had a very bad experience about this store. Today's coffee tastes like a hot water I can barely smell it the coffee smell yesterday day was horrible taste and their excuse was it was brewed too long ago. I'll never go back to this store.
Always great staff, always great coffee.  A great place to sit and converse!
This coffee shop has a wonderful feel. Like you are in an Alaskan cabin. Very homie and great for a coffee date. Wonderful lattes and specialized drinks. Many snacks and sandwiches to buy.
My favorite coffee  place, after 4 years
Sweet staff, always clean cozy, and such good quality
I took regular and also decaf espresso and it is very good ..nice customer service too.
LOVE their spicy mocha!!

Have gone to this coffee shop for many many years! Always had topnotch service. Even when lines were long they moved quickly. The coffee is tasty and not burnt! I miss the spicy mocha though! It always seemed I was the only one ordering it! Haha
Great place to study!
Awesome coffee
Great! Friendly, fast and incredible delicious coffee. The Baristas at this establishment will serve you well, enjoy!!!
Cute coffee shop. Lattes are always a little too sweet for my taste but staff is awesome and there's plenty of places to sit.

It's Caribou! The best coffee and they always provide service with a smile. I'm sure all the coffee options are great but I know that the Iced Caramel Crafted Press will change your life with it's smooth flavor and a hint of caramel that settles in as soon as you take the first sip. Go. Enjoy. Return.
I've been coming here for over ten years now, and it's honestly my second home in Charlotte. I love everyone who works here and always feel welcomed.

Coffee was great but as soon as I walked In the guy taking my order wasn't friendly and almost seemed like I was a bother to him, but as soon as another customer came in I guess who he knew he waved, smiled and spoke to her. How come I couldn't get the same interaction? I've been coming to this place for years and this was the only "negative experience" I had
Great muffins with your coffee!
Free refills on coffee. Great, free public wifi.
It's a coffee shop. No big stretch.
Great little spot for good coffee. Quiet, cozy atmosphere! Their seasonal drinks are always my favorite. The staff is helpful in making sure your drink is just right
Great Coffee!
Great coffee shop. Well managed and perfect atmosphere for writing or conversation with friends.
My favorite Tuesday evening hangout
Excellent service and coffee.
Best coffee ever. My favorite place!
They are always so nice to me here. Free WiFi, too! Inside & outside seating.
Friendly staff.   Great coffee and pastries.   Very warm, neighborhood feel.
Best staff in charlotte
My favorite place for coffee. Great coffee, fun environment.
Great feeling every time we visit.  Very hometown
Always friendly.
Great place to meet. Great coffee
The coffee was good and the servers were pretty chill.
Actually an Einsein Bros but the service was good and the place was very clean.

Its a wonderful little coffee shop. Very aesthetically designed and friendly staff. One thing i missed moving from seattle is a comfy place where i can do work and good coffee. I think i found one now.

What's not to love about free wifi, a cozy atmosphere, a hot cup of coffee?! Although the quality of the coffee and prices are both amazing, I wish the customer service was a bit better. I rarely see any smiles or conversation between the customers and employees. Other than that, it's a quick places to get fantastic coffee.
Always liked Caribou's coffee better than the other chain but hard to find in the South. Great coffee and workers were very helpful.

I had a business meeting at this location today, was very excited because I haven't had a Caribou Coffee in awhile.  When I picked up my order as well as my partners order from the counter I asked about the chocolate covered espresso bean. The lady behind the counter informed me it came with a specific "mocha" coffee. Now I did order a mocha coffee but apparently I did not order THE mocha coffee that comes with the special coffee bean. When I asked again which mocha and stated I did order a mocha coffee, she shrugged stated It wasn't the correct mocha, said she was sorry and turned around.  Now I understand you may want to make a drink a little extra special by adding the espresso bean but please don't forget customer service goes a long way!
Campfire mocha is amazing
Better than Starbucks
So much better than the other coffee store
Excellent staff!
I love this place
The people are great and the coffee is good. Nice place to study- WiFi is free
Nice atmosphere, excellent coffee and very nice staff. Highly recommend!
Relaxed, cozy atmosphere. And great coffee!
It's not Starbucks; you can't get a Diabeetes Unicorn!!  #teamCaribou
It's the best corporate-owned coffee shop in Charlotte. These are some truly lovely people.
Delish coffee. Service is always fast and place is clean.
As I walked in the door was treated nicely service fast coffee wonderful, apple fritter absolutely delicious..
Anyways great place to be!

Better coffee. Best service. [2 years ago]
2017 - Still better coffee, better service, friendlier, comfortable place to relax with eclectic music playing that can be heard but not overbearing.
Decent Espressos and great latte varieties.  Crew is awesome.
Great spot and pretty good coffee. My biggest gripe is that seating is tight and outlets are hard to find by.
Coffee is GOOD and super cozy inside. Staff is always nice to me
Love the atmosphere, but mediocre coffee.
sweet
Hurray Caribou!
Manager making drinks lies on purpose about if the ingredients in my drink was correct so to get me out the door because he was busy and short handed. What a lier.
Met a friend here, good place to chat, tea was good.
Great coffee. While I always get the coffee to go, they seem to have a nice interior.
One of the last Caribou's standing in Charlotte - never had an issue. They have very short and odd hours.
Super busy in morning I went. Clearly there need to be more Caribou's around. Hate that they closed some locations.
It has the best smoothies
Hard to discern menu.
Good coffee for a good price. Nice environment.
Est in 1992, a great place for coffee lovers. I tried hot chocolate, and it was really creamy and nice. Right amount of sugar. Not very strong, but good enough. I should try variety next.
Good coffee. Great service. Comfortable atmosphere.
Nice spot with great coffee. Good, comfy chairs and a pleasant atmosphere. Quiet enough for casual meetings or reading a book.

Better than Starbucks. Cool decor and nice people.
Not trying to sell me something other than what I want.
Great coffee (Starlite)
Always great.
Awesome
